basics.name: Iosif Sakos
basics.label: Research Fellow
basics.summary: Research Fellow at Singapore University of Technology and Design working on algorithmic game theory and nonconvex optimization. My research focuses on learning and equilibration in strategic multi-agent environments with structural algebraic properties that facilitate analysis and algorithm design.
